meanings.definition: A person who is experienced or knowledgeable in a particular field or subject.
meanings.sent1: The science mavin explained the complex theory in simple terms.
meanings.sent2: She is a mavin in computer programming and can fix any issue.
meanings.sent3: The gardening mavin grew a garden so big, it reached the sky!
meanings.sent4: He was a mavin of the culinary arts, turning simple ingredients into masterpieces.
meanings.sent5: The history mavin's knowledge was as vast as the ocean.

meanings.definition: To be skilled or proficient in a particular area.
meanings.sent1: She will mavin the art of painting after years of practice.
meanings.sent2: He mavined the art of playing the piano with grace and precision.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to mavin the art of baking delicious cakes.
meanings.sent4: The athlete mavined the skill of running faster than the wind.
meanings.sent5: They aimed to mavin the craft of storytelling through their writing.
